description: Amendments to planning permission dated 14th March 2023 (RN:22/05004/FULL) for, "Alteration and extension of existing buildings including removal of one single storey extensions and one part single and part two storey extension, erection of infill extensions at first to third floor levels, a replacement part single storey and part three storey side extension adjoining Mount Street Garden and a replacement single store extension fronting onto South Street, use of part lower ground and part ground floor levels as an art gallery with ancillary storage and office accommodation (Class E), use of part basement/lower ground , part ground floor and first to fourth floor levels to aparthotel to provide 10 visitor accommodation units (Class C1) with ancillary facilities at ground and lower ground floor level, including communal lounge/library at ground floor level, use of ground to third floor of no.35A South Street, first and second floors of no.35 South Street and first to fourth floor of no. 17 South Audley Street as six residential units (Class C3), creation of terraces at first floor level within a central greened courtyard, installation of plant and associated external alterations" [Site includes 22 South Audley Street, 35 South Street and 35A South Street]; Namely, the revision to the wording of Condition 32.
